column2: I am currently attending Mendix developer training by Motopp and have passion to advance my skills in ICT area
I am proficient in technology with practical experience in Microsoft Office applications
I am highly proficient in both spoken and written English and have good working knowledge in Dutch
I have excellent interpersonal, communication skills, and experience working with people from diverse backgrounds
I am motivated, eager to learn, discover and practically apply new concepts
I am an excellent team worker, committed to helping people and giving them right motivation and opportunity to shape their future

I have strong problem solving and organizational skills with ability to multitask, work under pressure and deal effectively with shifting priorities","{'country': 'Netherlands', 'short': 'Rotterdam, •	Coordinated actions related to administration of staff; ensured that staff time and attendance is properly recorded, verified and submitted in a timely manner
•	Managed vessel communications, including processing outgoing and incoming correspondence and forward for action to the appropriate department
•	Organized and coordinated project events
•	Translated, drafted, proofread and edited project guidelines, reports and correspondence; interpreted messages from English to Azerbaijani and vice versa during project operations, meetings and trainings', 'title': 'Vessel Administrator/Translator', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 10289880, 'name': 'Azerbaijan Tourism and Management University', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQHolfZBIgsNGQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519899793557?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=uDCjiA6OJIg2cF_j6heiwRVXQVIduWDnCOeBpV3lzws', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/atmuniversity/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Baku, Azerbaijan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'Azerbaijan Tourism and Management University', 'description': '• Taught English to university students in small groups in a classroom setting through integrated teaching of the four language skills – reading, writing, listening and speaking
• Developed course syllabus and lesson plan
• Collected and adapted teaching materials to the diverse needs of students
• Developed assessment materials
• Administered assessments to evaluate student progress
• Worked in concert with other faculty and staff
• Maintained attendance records
• Attended staff meetings', 'title': 'English Teacher', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 7601, 'name': 'McDermott International Inc.', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQErVvM57WXQxw/company-logo_400_400/0/1525994797510?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=MIjiDgChavUIkzrXahngihqchWm8iKD7QZxsTzEV30I', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/mcdermott-international-inc-/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Baku, Azerbaijan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'McDermott International, Ltd', 'description': '•	Taught offshore crew English to enhance specific job English skills to meet the job requirement level
•	Conducted individual, small and/or large group language classes using a wide variety of language teaching methodologies and techniques, stressing speaking, listening comprehension, and reading skills
•	Discussed and reviewed with line managers the job language skill levels required to perform various jobs
•	Carried out learners’ needs analysis to make appropriate adjustments
•	Designed effective job-oriented teaching program
•	Created instructional materials, such as handbooks, workbooks, audio and visual aids and instructional guides
•	Adapted teaching materials, techniques and approaches to the learner’s individual learning styles and needs
•	Created assessment tools
•	Identified and used suitable computer-assisted language learning software to facilitate the learning process
•	Conducted informal or formal progress evaluations
•	Analyzed program effectiveness and student performance, and reported the progress and findings', 'title': 'English Language Instructor', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Azerbaijan University of Languages', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Baku, Azerbaijan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'Azerbaijan University of Languages', 'description': '•	Taught English to university students in small groups in a classroom setting through integrated teaching of the four language skills – reading, writing, listening and speaking
•	Developed course syllabus and lesson plan
•	Collected and adapted teaching materials to the diverse needs of students
•	Developed assessment materials
•	Administered assessments to evaluate student progress
•	Worked in concert with other faculty and staff
•	Maintained attendance records
•	Attended staff meetings', 'title': 'English Teacher', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'The Ministry of Education of the Republic of Azerbaijan', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Baku, Azerbaijan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'The Ministry of Education of the Republic of Azerbaijan', 'description': '•	Provided consecutive interpretation from English to Azerbaijani for the World Bank mission members and project experts in high level official meetings and negotiations with top government officials, provided consecutive interpretation during conferences, seminars and trainings
•	Translated legislation, policy documents, project documents, letters and reports
•	Acting as a liaison with World Bank project experts, developed and maintained contacts with partner institutions', 'title': 'Interpreter/Translator', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}]",[],"['Application Development', 'Software Development', 'IT', 'Translation', 'Public Speaking', 'English', 'Language Teaching', 'Training', 'Employee Training', 'Teaching', 'Curriculum Design', 'Testing', 'Interpreting', 'Foreign Languages', 'Editing', 'Writing', 'Tutoring', 'Education', 'Lecturing', 'Research']",,,
